chunks.text: Sleep basics (non-medical): keep a consistent wake time, get morning light, avoid heavy meals late, and build a 10-minute wind-down (low light, calm music, journaling).
Stress reset: try 2 minutes of slow breathing (inhale 4, hold 2, exhale 6). Name one small next action and do it for 5 minutes.
Balanced plate idea: half vegetables, a palm-sized protein, a fist-sized carb, and a thumb of healthy fat. Adjust portions to hunger and activity.
